channel.title: Oldschool Trilogy (2speced custom remake)
channel.description:
OldSchool Trilogy info: Well Have Anyone else played 2speced rsps? It was an old school pking server with tons of people pking anytime of every day. well even though it had glitched combat, no gdw, and was easy to level & make money to go pking shortly after starting people still loved it and played it all the time. It shut down years ago and ever since i have played over 100+ rsps and even spent time downloading rsps after rsps in attempt to find a similar rsps that i enjoyed as much but the few times i found one they where offline within a few months or was too much eco base or something. I decided to attempt to make a Remake of it using a different base because delta was so bugged on 06/01/15 That RSPS would be "Oldschool Trilogy".
[SIZE=3]OS Trilogy is going to be a oldschool pking server that is easy to level and semi easy on making money so that players can get the stats and gear then need to pk within a short period of time after starting. (like 2speced)[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Need Testers[/SIZE]
I Did not want to post showoff untill i got farther along or nearly ready to host but i decided to post cause im getting to the point where i am starting to need multiple testers & some graphics made for me. -should be able to find me on[SIZE=3] skype by searching "trilogyreborn" or "mike allen" profile pic is kril and says trilogy reborn[/SIZE]. -skype me if you want to be a tester (accounts will be cleaned on release but you will be rewarded with a beta title or beta only cosmetics) -or skype me if you are intrested in making banners for forums, support banners, client background gfx, ect.
Anyways here are the updates ive done too OS Trilogy sofar: [SPOILER=Click to Extend]*GodWars updates: -command to tele to gwd for now, ill add to boss tele later (6/18/15 -added all npc (6/18/15) -added kc (6/18/15) -added kc interface and player saving (6/18/15) -Added objects & clickobject to get you to all boss rooms (6/19/15) -Added correct correct attack type, and animations for bosses. (06/28/15) -bosses and minons attack when you walk in door (06/28/15) *Drops -cleared the drops (06/27/15) -rewrote the drops from nothing (06/27/15) *Crafting -no longer get glory or fury when cutting dragstone/onyx (06/27/15) -you first cut gems, then cut again for bolt tips (06/27/15) -use cut gem with gold bar for ammy (06/27/15) *Shops updates: -cleared the shops so i could start fresh. (06/20/15) -general store (redone) (06/20/15) -weapons (redone) (06/20/15) -armour (redone) (06/20/15) -pure (added) (06/20/15) -range (redone) (06/20/15) -magic (redone) (06/20/15) -skiller shop (redone) (06/20/15) -slayer shop (redone) (06/20/15) -pking shop (redone) (06/20/15) -clan capes shop (added) (06/20/15) -buying anything shop (06/22/15) -added assault and void shop (06/22/15) *Assault -custom assult mini (similar to 2speced) (06/28/15) -assault point system (06/28/15) -kill 5 different monsters for assault points (06/28/15) -assault pnts shop (06/28/15) -prayer can not be used in assault mini (06/28/15) *Teleports -base was using npc to tele you through the game (deleted) (06/25/15) -added spellbook teleports(06/25/15) -seperated multi and single pk teleports(06/25/15) *items -added comp cape w/ no stats (06/26/15) -added arma cbow w/ +10 range compared to rcbow(06/26/15) *clues -deleted old clues (06/25/15) -added 4 clue difficulties (06/25/15) - easy clue, dropped by easy monsters, give low lvl rewards casket (06/25/15) - med clue, dropped by harder slayer monsters and tz, gives med lvl reward casket (06/25/15) - hard clue, dropped by bosses, gives high level reward casket (06/25/15) - random clue, pkp + assult + pc + slayer point shops, gives a random casket (06/25/15) - cleared old rewards and rewrote (06/25/15) *Edited tons of prices (6/22/15) *Made torso, barrows gloves, and defenders tradable and pkable (like 2speced) (6/22/15) *changed xp rated for easy meele, med mage, and hard range xp (6/22/15) *added pure command permanently (like 2speced) (06/28/15) *added maxed command temp for beta testing (06/28/15) *added barrows command 1k every set temp for beta testing (06/28/15) *changed all basic server and client naming, ect. (06/29/15) *fixed godwars int. so it changes without have to relog (06/29/15) *changed arma cbow int. to wield (06/29/15) *added 1b ticket (06/29/15)
**need to do: -1bill tickets(add) -fancy robe shop for pures(add) -don shop (maybe redo) -gdw graple and swimming animations -alters in boss rooms -gdw clipping -interface to lock each skill indivisually so i can remove the xplock command - make karam work like they do in rsps - test pk weapons so that i know rather to buff or strengthen weapons and specs -test more skills and edit if needed[/SPOILER]
Media:
[SPOILER=Click to Extend]recent fixes [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/fixes.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/fixes.png[/img][/URL]
Clues [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/clues.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/clues.png[/img][/URL]
spec weapons [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/special.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/special.png[/img][/URL]
Clan Chat [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/clan%20chat.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/clan%20chat.png[/img][/URL]
Pest Control [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/pc.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/pc.png[/img][/URL]
Castle Assault [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/Assault.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/Assault.png[/img][/URL]
GodWars [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/godwars_2.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/godwars_2.png[/img][/URL]
Shops [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/shops_1.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/shops_1.png[/img][/URL]
new Teleports [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/tele.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/tele.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER]
I will be adding a lot more and posting in on here every couple days or maybe even more often. Last time post was updated: 06/29/15 Thanks Everybody! -Michael

item.title: Oldschool Trilogy (2speced custom remake)
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

OldSchool Trilogy info:
Well Have Anyone else played 2speced rsps?
It was an old school pking server with tons of people pking anytime of every day.
well even though it had glitched combat, no gdw, and was easy to level & make money to go pking shortly after starting people still loved it and played it all the time.
It shut down years ago and ever since i have played over 100+ rsps and even spent time downloading rsps after rsps in attempt to find a similar rsps that i enjoyed as much but the few times i found one they where offline within a few months
or was too much eco base or something.
I decided to attempt to make a Remake of it using a different base because delta was so bugged on 06/01/15
That RSPS would be “Oldschool Trilogy”.

[SIZE=3]OS Trilogy is going to be a oldschool pking server that is easy to level and semi easy on making money so that players can get the stats and gear then need to pk within a short period of time after starting. (like 2speced)[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Need Testers[/SIZE]

I Did not want to post showoff untill i got farther along or nearly ready to host but i decided to post cause im getting to the point where i am starting to need multiple testers & some graphics made for me.
-should be able to find me on[SIZE=3] skype by searching “trilogyreborn” or “mike allen” profile pic is kril and says trilogy reborn[/SIZE].
-skype me if you want to be a tester (accounts will be cleaned on release but you will be rewarded with a beta title or beta only cosmetics)
-or skype me if you are intrested in making banners for forums, support banners, client background gfx, ect.

Anyways here are the updates ive done too OS Trilogy sofar:
[SPOILER=Click to Extend]*GodWars updates:
-command to tele to gwd for now, ill add to boss tele later (6/18/15
-added all npc (6/18/15)
-added kc (6/18/15)
-added kc interface and player saving (6/18/15)
-Added objects & clickobject to get you to all boss rooms (6/19/15)
-Added correct correct attack type, and animations for bosses. (06/28/15)
-bosses and minons attack when you walk in door (06/28/15)
*Drops
-cleared the drops (06/27/15)
-rewrote the drops from nothing (06/27/15)
*Crafting
-no longer get glory or fury when cutting dragstone/onyx (06/27/15)
-you first cut gems, then cut again for bolt tips (06/27/15)
-use cut gem with gold bar for ammy (06/27/15)
*Shops updates:
-cleared the shops so i could start fresh. (06/20/15)
-general store (redone) (06/20/15)
-weapons (redone) (06/20/15)
-armour (redone) (06/20/15)
-pure (added) (06/20/15)
-range (redone) (06/20/15)
-magic (redone) (06/20/15)
-skiller shop (redone) (06/20/15)
-slayer shop (redone) (06/20/15)
-pking shop (redone) (06/20/15)
-clan capes shop (added) (06/20/15)
-buying anything shop (06/22/15)
-added assault and void shop (06/22/15)
*Assault
-custom assult mini (similar to 2speced) (06/28/15)
-assault point system (06/28/15)
-kill 5 different monsters for assault points (06/28/15)
-assault pnts shop (06/28/15)
-prayer can not be used in assault mini (06/28/15)
*Teleports
-base was using npc to tele you through the game (deleted) (06/25/15)
-added spellbook teleports(06/25/15)
-seperated multi and single pk teleports(06/25/15)
*items
-added comp cape w/ no stats (06/26/15)
-added arma cbow w/ +10 range compared to rcbow(06/26/15)
*clues
-deleted old clues (06/25/15)
-added 4 clue difficulties (06/25/15)
- easy clue, dropped by easy monsters, give low lvl rewards casket (06/25/15)
- med clue, dropped by harder slayer monsters and tz, gives med lvl reward casket (06/25/15)
- hard clue, dropped by bosses, gives high level reward casket (06/25/15)
- random clue, pkp + assult + pc + slayer point shops, gives a random casket (06/25/15)
- cleared old rewards and rewrote (06/25/15)
*Edited tons of prices (6/22/15)
*Made torso, barrows gloves, and defenders tradable and pkable (like 2speced) (6/22/15)
*changed xp rated for easy meele, med mage, and hard range xp (6/22/15)
*added pure command permanently (like 2speced) (06/28/15)
*added maxed command temp for beta testing (06/28/15)
*added barrows command 1k every set temp for beta testing (06/28/15)
*changed all basic server and client naming, ect. (06/29/15)
*fixed godwars int. so it changes without have to relog (06/29/15)
*changed arma cbow int. to wield (06/29/15)
*added 1b ticket (06/29/15)

**need to do:
-1bill tickets(add)
-fancy robe shop for pures(add)
-don shop (maybe redo)
-gdw graple and swimming animations
-alters in boss rooms
-gdw clipping
-interface to lock each skill indivisually so i can remove the xplock command
- make karam work like they do in rsps
- test pk weapons so that i know rather to buff or strengthen weapons and specs
-test more skills and edit if needed[/SPOILER]

Media:

[SPOILER=Click to Extend]recent fixes
[URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/fixes.png.html][/URL]

Clues

spec weapons

[URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/pc.png.html][/URL]

Castle Assault
[URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/Assault.png.html][/URL]

GodWars
[URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/godwars_2.png.html][/URL]

Shops
[URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/shops_1.png.html][/URL]

new Teleports
[URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/tele.png.html][/URL]
[/SPOILER]

I will be adding a lot more and posting in on here every couple days or maybe even more often.
Last time post was updated: 06/29/15
Thanks Everybody!
-Michael
